tool_description: Scalable APIs for Image Generation & Image operations like compress, resize, merge, add watermark, and add frame. Also, to generate Ads, Social Media visuals, website banners and other graphics.
name: Picnie
title: Picnie

api_list.name: https://picnie.com/api/v1/create-image-collection
api_list.description:
This API is used to generate a **Multi Image Collection**. you can customize the template JSON object as per your requirements.

Change the **Image/Text** values and generate the images at any scale.

**Parameters**

template_group_id - (Required)

project_id - (Required) // if you don't have project then you can create using Picnie's dashboard

details - (Required) put the json object
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://picnie1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/create-image-collection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "picnie1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://picnie1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/create-image-collection"

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: https://picnie.com/api/v1/compress-image
api_list.description:
StartFragment

This API is used to compress images without losing the quality of the image.

**Parameters**

**project_id** - (Required) // if you don't have project then you can create using Picnie's dashboard

**image_url**\- (Required)

**image_quality** - (Required) // You can give value between 55 to 70 in lowest to maximum quality.

**image_output_format -** (Required) default value is **original** for same as input. you can give **jpg, png, webp** as per your need.

EndFragment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://picnie1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/compress-image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "picnie1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: https://picnie.com/api/v1/create-image
api_list.description:
This API is used to generate a **Single Image**. you can customize the template JSON object as per your requirements.

Change the **Image/Text** values and generate the images at any scale.

**Parameters**

template_id - (Required)

project_id - (Required) // if you don't have project then you can create using Picnie's dashboard

template_name - (Required)

type - (Required) put "**image**" in the value

details - (Required) put the json object
api_list.code:

url = "https://picnie1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/create-image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "picnie1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: https://picnie.com/api/v1/add-watermark-image
api_list.description:
This API is used to add watermark Logo/Image to another image. You can merge two images using this API.

**Parameters**

**project_id** \- (Required) // if you don't have project then you can create using Picnie's dashboard

**background_image_url**\- (Required)

**front_image_url** \- (Required)

**position** \- (Required) // here you can use 9 different positions to set the watermark.

tl - Top Left

tc - Top Center

tr - Top Right

ml - Middle Left

mc - Middle Center

mr - Middle Right

bl - Bottom Left

bc - Bottom Center

br - Bottom Right

**image_max_width** \- (Required)

**image_max_height** \- (Required)

url = "https://picnie1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/add-watermark-image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "picnie1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: https://picnie.com/api/v1/get-template
api_list.description:
This API is used to get the contents of the Template. you just need to put **template_id** as key with the value in json object. you will get the response in JSON object.

**Parameters**

template_id - (Required)

api_list.name: https://picnie.com/api/v1/create-project
api_list.description:
This API is used to Create a project on Picnie. This helps you to manage your assets, you'll be able to access your assets from your Picnie dashboard

**Parameters**

**name** - (Required) // Name of your Project

api_list.name: https://picnie.com/api/v1/resize-image
api_list.description:
This API is used to resize bulk images. You can resize image using height & width or by percentage.

**Parameters**

**project_id** - (Required) // if you don't have project then you can create using Picnie's dashboard

**image_url**\- (Required)

**resize_type** - (Required) // 1 for resizing with height and width, 2 for resizing with by percentage

**height** - Required when **resize_type** is 1

**width**\- Required when **resize_type** is 1

**resize_percentage** - Required when **resize_type** is 2

**no_enlarge_on_smaller -** if it is 1 then system will not increase the image size when image is smaller than given resolution.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://picnie1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/resize-image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "picnie1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
